CrossContractDependencies.ERC20InterfaceTransfer: The transferAnyERC20Token function enables interaction with ERC20 tokens via an external contract.
CrossContractDependencies.WhaleDonation: The contract interacts with the 'whale' address by invoking whale.call.value(amount) which relies on the presence of a 'donate()' function.

InterContractConsistencyConditions.WhaleInteraction: Maintains consistency by directing donations and half of losing wagers to the whale address, assuming it is capable of handling ETH donations.
